summary: This FBI 302 report documents the seizure of 18 hard drives from the CCTV system server rack at the Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC) in New York on August 10, 2019. The hard drives were handed over by an MCC Electronics Technician to an FBI Special Agent, with an FD-597 property receipt completed.

connections.description: ET, an MCC employee, handed over seized hard drives to SA, an FBI Special Agent, as part of an evidence collection procedure.

events.title: Seizure of CCTV hard drives from MCC
events.description: FBI Special Agent seized 18 hard drives from the CCTV system server rack at the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, NY
New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: On August 10, 2019, the FBI seized 18 hard drives from the CCTV system at the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.
The hard drives were removed from a NICE VISION PRO CCTV system server rack by an MCC Electronics Technician (ET).
An FD-597 property receipt was completed and provided to the Electronics Technician, documenting the transfer of evidence.
The document is an FBI 302 report dated August 15, 2019, documenting the evidence seizure procedure.
